item.description:
THIS MEETUP IS CANCELED DUE TO RAIN!!!

 

Let's get together and hike Foster's Pond.

 

Foster's Pond is a delightful area that has many intersecting trails! We will hike at a moderate pace and adjust our route to accommodate the stamina and preference of the group. There are many water views and a few bridges along the way so that we can observe nature at its very best.

Please dress in layers for your comfort and bring plenty of water and bug spray!!!!!

This event is cross-posted to other meetups so please RSVP "Yes" on one site. No need to RSVP "NO." As always, participation in all meetup events is at your own risk.

 

Contact Barb/Peanut at 603-540-7467.
item.how_to_find_us: WE WILL MEET IN THE PARKING LOT BY THE BASEBALL FIELD.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: MID DAY - MID WEEK HIKE AT FOSTER'S POND ---THIS MEETUP IS CANCELED DUE TO RAIN!
